  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Restaurant Inventory Officer",
  "description": "Bukka Hut Restaurant is a fast-growing organization with almost 20 outlets in Lagos, and we care greatly about our staff. Beyond hospitality, Bukka Hut thrives as a people-centric brand with a laser focus on championing people empowerment initiatives. We like to view our business sectors as channels used to transform the lives of our stakeholders. This stems from our internal workforce to the community we operate in.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Inventory Officer
Job Locations:&nbsp;Lekki, Jakande, Chevron and Yaba - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Receive, inspect, and properly store incoming goods and materials
	Maintain accurate inventory records and ensure proper stock levels
	Organize and label inventory in a logical and accessible manner
	Conduct regular stock counts and reconcile discrepancies
	Prepare and maintain inventory reports using inventory management software or Excel
	Ensure cleanliness and safety within the storage area
	Coordinate with procurement and other departments to fulfill supply needs


Requirements


	High School Diploma or equivalent; additional qualifications in store management or logistics are a plus
	1 year of&nbsp;proven experience as a storekeeper or in inventory management
	Proficient in the use of computers, especially MS Excel and inventory software
	Good organizational and communication skills
	Ability to work independently and manage time effectively
	Applicants should be residents of the Island and the Mainland.


Salary
N120,000 - N130,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@bukkahut.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Only qualified candidates will be contacted.",

Restaurant Inventory Officer Job at Bukka Hut Restaurant




        
    

        
        Bukka Hut Restaurant is a fast-growing organization with almost 20 outlets in Lagos, and we care greatly about our staff. Beyond hospitality, Bukka Hut thrives as a people-centric brand with a laser focus on championing people empowerment initiatives. We like to view our business sectors as channels used to transform the lives of our stakeholders. This stems from our internal workforce to the community we operate in.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Inventory Officer
Job Locations: Lekki, Jakande, Chevron and Yaba - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Receive, inspect, and properly store incoming goods and materials
	Maintain accurate inventory records and ensure proper stock levels
	Organize and label inventory in a logical and accessible manner
	Conduct regular stock counts and reconcile discrepancies
	Prepare and maintain inventory reports using inventory management software or Excel
	Ensure cleanliness and safety within the storage area
	Coordinate with procurement and other departments to fulfill supply needs


Requirements


	High School Diploma or equivalent; additional qualifications in store management or logistics are a plus
	1 year of proven experience as a storekeeper or in inventory management
	Proficient in the use of computers, especially MS Excel and inventory software
	Good organizational and communication skills
	Ability to work independently and manage time effectively
	Applicants should be residents of the Island and the Mainland.


Salary
N120,000 - N130,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@bukkahut.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at Flying Doctors Nigeria
content:
Flying Doctors Nigeria is a tech-enabled global marketplace for urgent/emergency medical care. We specifically serve the oil & gas, mining, and international insurance industries.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

1.) Medical Doctor

Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Degree in medicine
	Minimum qualification of Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery from a recognized University.
	Must possess a valid practicing license.
	Experience and ability to function optimally in clinical practice within an urgent care and primary care/Emergency medicine and telemedicine.
	BLS and ACLS certificate.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to understand and adhere to established policies, procedures, and protocols.
	Demonstrated competence in reacting to and handling emergencies.
	Ability to remain calm under pressure and reassure frightened patients.
	Great judgement and decision-making skills.
	Good physical agility.


Click here to apply online

 

 

2.) Nurse

Job Location: Nigeria
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Degree in nursing- minimum qualification of Bachelor of Nursing from a recognized University.
	Must possess a valid practicing license.
	Experience and ability to function optimally in clinical practice within an urgent care and primary care/Emergency medicine and telemedicine.
	BLS and ACLS certificate.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to understand and adhere to established policies, procedures, and protocols.
	Demonstrated competence in reacting to and handling emergencies.
	Ability to remain calm under pressure and reassure frightened patients.
	Great judgement and decision-making skills.
	Good physical agility.


Click here to apply online

 

 

3.) Experienced Ambulance Driver

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	3+ years of experience driving an Ambulance
	Resident in Port Harcourt


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@flyingdoctorsnigeria.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

4.) Medical Doctor

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in Medicine
	Valid practicing license
	Expertise in urgent care, primary care, emergency medicine, or telemedicine
	ACLS/BLS certification
	Exceptional communication & interpersonal skills.


Method of Aplication 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@flyingdoctorsnigeria.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

     

    

        Click here to Apply

Customer Success Associate Job at Zest Payments Limited




        
    

        
        Zest Payments Limited is a venture-backed digital therapeutics company focused on advancing equality of opportunities in healthcare. Today, we are harnessing some of the latest scientific research in developing a new online care model for the prevention, monitoring, and reversal of chronic diseases such as Diabetes Mellitus. Tomorrow, we might be using personal health information and advanced analytics to recommend the best preventive care for the general population. The future is open.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Success Associate

Job Location: Lagos

Requirements
     

            
    




	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@zestpayment.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
